DOC.brief_summary: A Multicenter , Double-blind 16 Week Study augmentation atypical antipsychotic Aripiprazole patient Schizophrenia inadequate response antipsychotic treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole Used Dual Therapy Treatement Patients With Chronic Stable Schizophrenia Schizoaffective Disorder .
